website_summaries.verdict: Users rave about the bounce and overall quality. If you want to train like a pro, this is the one to get.
pros: Approved by International Table Tennis Federation
cons: A bit pricier than some other models

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a $700 table which was nice but upon examining this table it is easy to see that you definitely get what you pay for. Everything about it is top notch. If you love table tennis and can afford the extra cost then I highly recommend it. This table will be listed in my will some day. If there was a negative I would say that it was the packing which seemed insufficient. Some casters were damaged but the seller responded quickly to rectify the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Gary O.

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable table that will last for years!
customer_reviews.text: While not inexpensive, you get what you pay for with this solidly built table. I also needed a very good table that was easy for 1 person to setup for play and put away and a table that took up the least amount of space when stored. This table does it all in spades. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GOARMY1982

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding table
customer_reviews.text: 1. Heavy as hell; getting out of the truck and all the way to basement was very painful. 2. Out of the box no assembly needed which was amazing. 3. The table is gorgeous. Solid and very well put together. The craftsmanship of this table is outstanding. 4. The bounce is good and consistent every time. That tells you it is professional grade table. 5. The table folds effortlessly for storage. 6. It came with net-set and was a great buy. I am thrilled about this table and would recommend it to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Tournament quality table at a discount. One or two minor surface scratches on mine and everything else looked brand new. No reason to buy this table new. Dropped off in my driveway. No assembly required. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo David

customer_reviews.title: BEST TABLE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful and the bounce is as good as can be. This is a professional quality table for a fraction of the cost. I really love the fact that it was pre-assembled and easy to fold up and move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yet easy to set up and store
customer_reviews.text: It feels very solid and well-built, yet easy to set up and store. Has a clean, uniform surface with good bounce. Requires a boxcutter to remove it from the packaging, cutting around the dotted line towards the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast - table is great - very high quality - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Tournament used table is like new.
customer_reviews.text: Tournament used table is like new. Solid construction, appears very durable, playing surface feels just right. It’s a high quality table!
customer_reviews.author: ab1708cd

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the table is perfect, like new condition. the shipping was fast and the customer service was great like always with amazon.com. i would recommend this product to anybody looking for a great table
customer_reviews.author: Michael Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table
customer_reviews.text: This table plays as well as any table I have played on. It arrived ready to play...no assembly required. It folds easy for storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Out of the box, no assembly needed. Difficult getting it down to the basement. The surface is however very scratch sensitive. The paint chips easily if the racquet hits the top surface. Otherwise excellent and lots of fun. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: HRM

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant table
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave me this for Christmas and it is perfect. Easy to assemble (Remove one pin and roll it out of the box!) Perfect table (Smooth, net sets up simply and easily adjustable) This is the best table I have ever seen much less played on.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love this table
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this table. It is of very high quality. Sturdy and the finishes are perfect. We feel we are part of the world championships every time we play. Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Making you play like a pro
customer_reviews.text: Making you play like a pro. Very good and durable. No assembles is required. Ready to play when arrived. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Butterfly Centrefold 25 Table Tennis Table | Professional Ping Pong Table | 25mm Indoor Folding Ping Pong Table | Strong Frame | Professional Ping Pong Net Included | 5 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: ITTF TABLE TENNIS TABLE: Approved by International Table Tennis Federation to exacting standards.
5-YEAR WARRANTY: Be assured of professional quality for this indoor ping pong table. No assembly!
1 INCH TOP: Enjoy true bounces for consistent play in clubs, institutions, & home game rooms.
FOLDAWAY: Fold and roll easily into smaller storage spaces. Store one or multiple tables compactly.
FREE PROFESSIONAL NET: Tournament-approved Butterfly Europa ping pong net set included.
